meanings.definition: Relating to the act of attributing something to a particular cause or source.
meanings.sent1: The attributional process helps us understand why things happen.
meanings.sent2: Her attributional skills are crucial in determining the root of the issue.
meanings.sent3: The attributional puzzle was finally solved with a simple clue.
meanings.sent4: His attributional radar was finely tuned to detect any discrepancies.
meanings.sent5: The attributional nature of the problem became clearer with each clue uncovered.

meanings.definition: Involving the assignment of credit or blame to a specific person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The attributional decision was fair and based on evidence.
meanings.sent2: She received an attributional award for her outstanding performance.
meanings.sent3: The attributional game of pointing fingers was not productive.
meanings.sent4: His attributional approach was like a spotlight on the truth.
meanings.sent5: The attributional spotlight shone brightly on the deserving winner.
